ygData.subject: Java Code Conventions
ygData.msgSnippet: In general, we should try to follow the Java code formatting and naming conventions set out by Sun at:

In general, we should try to follow the Java code formatting and 
naming conventions set out by Sun at:

http://java.sun.com/docs/codeconv/html/CodeConvTOC.doc.html

There will always be deviations, sometimes necessary, and
don't hold up code for compliance -- but when in doubt, 
or cleaning up messy code, lean towards these standards.

- Gordon
